name: Drowsy
description: our eyes feel so heavy... maybe you should just... zzz... WHA?! Wait! Don't fall asleep!
resist: Use an action to make a roll of Insight. Add up the successes of these rolls until you get an overall total of 5 to clear the status.
effect: The effected pokemon's Defense and Special Defense is lowered by 1, stacking on top of the usual +/-3. Additionally, they take +1 minimum damage from all attacking moves.
